This vignette outlines how to capture study designs with `mp_design()` and
assumptions with `mp_assumptions()`.

```{r}
library(mixpower)
```

```{r}
design <- mp_design(
  clusters = list(subject = 40),
  trials_per_cell = 5,
  notes = "Baseline study layout"
)

assumptions <- mp_assumptions(
  fixed_effects = list(`(Intercept)` = 0, condition = 0.3),
  residual_sd = 1,
  icc = list(subject = 0.1)
)

design
assumptions
```
